sen.j: 仏覚寺（ぶっかくじ）は、奈良県橿原市に所在する日蓮正宗の寺院。
sen.e: Bukkaku-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture.
Bukkaku-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture.
Bukkaku-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 山号は所得山（しょとくさん）。
sen.e: Its sango (honorific mountain prefix) is Shotokusan.
Its sango (literally, "mountain name"), which is the title prefixed to the name of a Buddhist temple, is Shotokusan.

sen.cmt: 文頭のみ大文字にしました。

sen.j: 1981年（昭和56年）9月12日 - 建立される。
開基は日蓮正宗大石寺第67世法主日顕上人。
sen.e: The patron of the temple in its founding was Nikken Shonin, the 67th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.
The patron of the temple in its founding was Nikken Shonin, the 67th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.
The patron of the temple in its founding was Nikken Shonin, the 67th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.

sen.cmt: 文頭のみ大文字にしました。

sen.j: 奈良県立橿原高等学校
近鉄橿原線・近鉄南大阪線 橿原神宮前駅から徒歩20分
sen.e: 20 minute walk from Kashihara-jingumae Station on Kintetsu Kashihara line・Kintetsu Minami Osaka line.
20 minute walk from Kashihara-jingumae Station on Kintetsu Kashihara line・Kintetsu Minami Osaka line.
